test_cases.name: Count contractors

test_cases.query: How many contractors are in the database?

test_cases.name: Count active contractors
test_cases.description: COUNT with WHERE clause - tests basic filtering
test_cases.query: How many active contractors do we have?

test_cases.name: List all tables
test_cases.query: What tables are in the database?

test_cases.name: Describe contractors table
test_cases.query: What columns does the contractors table have?

test_cases.name: List contractors with details
test_cases.query: Show me all contractors with their names, phone numbers, and status

test_cases.name: Get table statistics
test_cases.query: What's the size and row count of the contractors table?

test_cases.name: Schema then query
test_cases.description: Two-step: describe then query - tests tool composition
test_cases.query: First show me the contractors table schema, then count how many contractors we have

test_cases.name: List tables, describe one, query it
test_cases.query: List all tables, show me the projects table structure, then count how many projects we have

test_cases.name: Multi-table analysis
test_cases.description: Complex business intelligence - tests analytical capabilities
test_cases.query: Analyze the distribution of contractors across different status values and show counts for each

test_cases.name: Invalid table name
test_cases.query: Show me data from the nonexistent_table
